title: Stanford study shows effects of toilet facilities on child health in rural Africa (Stanford University) ...
text: ( Source : Stanford University ) Stanford Report , October 13 , 2015 For decades, scientists have evaluated the health impact of sanitation conditions by measuring rates of diarrheal disease. A new study shows that child growth improves after
